data.name: Heaven Dust 2 - Costume Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
Unlock the following costumes by purchasing this DLC:

  • Samurai Armor: Samurai, take out your... submachine gun!
  • Mecha Ninja Uniform: A set of futuristic costumes, might be a Halloween costume from the Guard Room.

Changing the costumes in the locker room after getting them.
data.about_the_game:
Unlock the following costumes by purchasing this DLC:

  • Samurai Armor: Samurai, take out your... submachine gun!
  • Mecha Ninja Uniform: A set of futuristic costumes, might be a Halloween costume from the Guard Room.

Changing the costumes in the locker room after getting them.
data.short_description: Special costume [Samurai Armor] and [Mecha Ninja Uniform] in Heaven Dust 2.
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800) or equivalent / AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6670, GeForce GTX 200 series with at least 1GB
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device
